titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Hartford assises, March 14. 1616 by John Squire ...
titleStmt.author: Squire, John, ca. 1588-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.S. for Nicholas Bourne, and are to be sould at his shop at the south-entrance of the Royall Exchange,
